---
title: 'API Explorer'
search_results: 'Global Payments - API Explorer Overview'
subtitle: 'Test code interactively and explore the details of our API resources'
tag: 'rest'
created: '23/09/2024'
---
Our REST API is a single point of integration that provides access to a vast worldwide payments ecosystem. It easily enables the processing of payments in person, on a website, or within an application (in-app). You can use it to manage transactions, disputes, and deposits across a multitude of currencies, payment methods, and regions.

This overview shows you how to use our interactive API Explorer, provides a link to Postman to view our API collection, and identifies some key API resources to get you started (for more information about our resources and their related actions, see [Resources & Actions](/api/definitions/resources-actions) in API Definitions).

## How it works
Each resource's page in the API Explorer contains a list of related endpoints, header parameters, and models for both requests and responses. Details for individual items can be toggled to show or hide using the information icon. You can also use the copy icon to copy either the parameter itself, the example, or a link to that spot to refer to later or share. Just hover over a line item to see these two icons. To show or hide all of the details for a section at the same time, use the Toggle Details link.

![Resource with details showing with copy icon and toggle link.](/gh-assets/api-explorer_toggle-info.png)
 <p style={{textAlign: "center"}}>**Details Showing for an Item**</p>

After finding what you need, use the interactive playground of our API Explorer to call our API using JSON or cURL. We provide code samples to get you started, and you can use the down arrow to switch examples. Add your own values and run a test directly on the page. Responses appear right below so you can instantly see how it works. 

<img alt="Interactive playground with code example list showing." src="/gh-assets/api-explorer_playground.png" width="400" height="300" style={{display: "block", margin: "0 auto"}} />
 <p style={{textAlign: "center"}}>**Interactive Code Playground**</p>

## View in Postman

If you prefer to view our collection of API resources and methods in Postman, click the button below. You can also import or fork the collection.

<br />

<div class="postman-run-button" data-postman-action="collection/fork" data-postman-collection-url="entityId=15261149-a194b7f0-81f4-4b60-9259-f7258fb42092&amp;entityType=collection&amp;workspaceId=a25789c4-2d5d-46d4-8dd5-9a18a0154473" data-postman-param="env%5BUnified%20Payments%20Platform%20API%20(GP-API)%20Environment%

## Basic API Actions
<CardsGroup type="with_icon">
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/access-token" title="Access Token" icon="coin">
      Create an access token to execute an API action.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/transactions" title="Transactions" icon="money-bill-wave">
      Transfer funds between payer and merchant, and get transaction records.
    </Card>
</CardsGroup>
## Manage risk
<CardsGroup type="with_icon">
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/authentications" title="Authentications" icon="lock-alt">
      Request payer validation from the card issuer to support 3D Secure requirements.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/risk-assessments" title="Risk Assessments" icon="magnifying-glass-chart">
      Determine fraud risk for a transaction, payer, or payment method.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/payment-methods-tokenization" title="Stored Payment Methods" icon="coins">
      Use a token to securely store sensitive information for future sales and refunds.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/payers" title="Payers" icon="address-card">
      Store customer details such as name, addresses, and payment methods to use for future transactions.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/verifications" title="Verifications" icon="badge-check">
      Verify a payment method to create a transaction at a later time.
    </Card>
</CardsGroup>
## Manage transaction data
<CardsGroup type="with_icon">
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/actions" title="Actions" icon="list-alt">
      Report on all aspects of your app's usage of our API.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/batches" title="Batches" icon="grid-4">
      Close card-present batches and review them.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/deposits" title="Deposits" icon="piggy-bank">
      Obtain details of each deposit to your bank account.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/disputes" title="Disputes" icon="comment-exclamation">
      Manage dispute queries and chargebacks.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/reports" title="Reports" icon="file-chart-column">
      Get available reports for a merchant.
    </Card>
</CardsGroup>
## Expand your integration
<CardsGroup type="with_icon">
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/currency-conversion" title="Currency Conversion" icon="euro-sign">
      Dynamically convert the transaction amount to the payer's currency.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/links" title="Links" icon="link">
      Provide a unique payment link to your customer.
    </Card>
    <Card type="with_icon" link="/api/installments" title="Installments" icon="cc-visa">
      Allow Visa customers to pay for their purchases over time.
    </Card>
</CardsGroup>
